Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in kindergarten, I entered a competition and read 52 books in a week

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: You need a lot of effort and talent to produce greatness

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: What works for one person's needs is almost always very different from the next

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: I act as if my life depends on each decision. Because it does

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: Figure out what you really love doing and use your strengths on a daily basis

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: We're our own dragons as well as our own heroes, and we have to rescue ourselves from ourselves

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: I am cheerful. I don't know if I'm happy. There is a difference, you know

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: If little else, the brain is an educational toy

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer needs a life of introspection

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: I think science has begun to demonstrate that aging is a disease. If it is, it can be cured

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not infatuated with frivolousness. We're just good friends

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I live a pretty simple life

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you like my suit? I think this is an amazing suit, don't you think?

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: Hopefully you marry someone who you not only love, but who you like as well

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: If you buy an expensive thing and you never use it, I don't think there's a point to it

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: People tracking your life and photographing you anywhere you go, that can make you crazy

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never reacted well to other people telling me what to do

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: Son, never throw a punch at a redwood

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: And besides, because of all she has accomplished, Barbara Jordan has always been a hero of mine

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, there's so much imitation and so much pandering in Hollywood

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a strong, really good upbringing, not puritanical

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: I think true success is intrinsic... It's love. It's kindness. It's community

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is the belief we might get it done, and faith is the knowledge we will get it done

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: Christ is in all, meaning that the divine spark is in all things

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: We are what make up society

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no 'I.' That's an illusion we've got to get beyond

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: As a culture, I think we need to redefine what it means to be happy

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in unity, as opposed to division

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: Definition is the death of discovery

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: Technology is not good, it's neutral

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: I think laughter is a sacred act

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: If you carry your childhood with you, you never become older

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: Every exit is an entry somewhere else

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: Maturity is a high price to pay for growing up

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the voting that's democracy; it's the counting

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: Good things, when short, are twice as good

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: If enough things that are untrue are said about you, no one will know what really is true

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: Any revival in which I am involved is liable to change

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life is waiting for the questions to which I have prepared answers

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: Theatre is a series of insurmountable obstacles on the road to imminent disaster

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't you know there ain't no devil, it's just god when he's drunk

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to win when you always lose

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: I do like books on anatomy. I have to say I'm an amateur physician, I guess

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: George Bush is a fan of mine, he came to see me in the Seventies. His coke dealer brought him

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: Any place is good for eavesdropping, if you know how to eavesdrop

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather have a free bottle in front of me than a prefrontal lobotomy

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so horny the crack of dawn better watch out

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: Champagne for my real friends and real pain for my sham friends

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: The piano has been drinking, not me

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: The big print giveth and the small print taketh away

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is a facelift that's in everyone's price range!

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Many of us are more capable than some of us... but none of us is as capable as all of us!

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: About the only time losing is more fun than winning is when you're fighting temptation

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I ever had an out-of-body experience - I'd try to come back to a different one

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to worry about the future - so I take each day just one anxiety attack at a time

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no future in spending our present worrying about our past

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Mondays are the potholes in the road of life

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness doesn't depend on how much you have to enjoy, but how much you enjoy what you have

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: The surest cure for vanity is loneliness

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: Miami is a melting pot in which none of the stones melt. They rattle around

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the artist, then, life's hungry man, the glutton of eternity, beauty's miser, glory's slave

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: A cult is a religion with no political power

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: If a conservative is a liberal who's been mugged, a liberal is a conservative who's been arrested

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: Frankly, these days, without a theory to go with it, I can't see a painting

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: You never realise how much of your background is sewn into the lining of your clothes

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: Nonfiction is never going to die

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think journalists should talk about whom they're voting for

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: But you can't exercise and be high. It's impossible

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did smoke that much pot; never was a big pothead

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: Cigarettes, I won't do cigarettes, nicotine will kill ya

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I left the country when Reagan got in; I went to France

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of prophets have gone to jail

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything that happens to me is very cosmic

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been a good boy, I've never really been convicted of serious crime

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing is about Cheech and Chong, we've brought more families together than Dr. Phil

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't become a dictator through checks and balances

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I get tested, I ask questions about it, and I watch how they do it

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's dangerous to think that you're successful, because then you become complacent

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: We are going back to our roots by cultivating new unsigned talent who otherwise might go unnoticed

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to look fashionable and put-together, not like you hit every sale rack this season

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought, if I went into business I'd be able to control my own destiny

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a designer of more than clothes. I am a designer of a very creative concept

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: In designing a lifestyle brand, you have to know more than just designing clothes

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: We like to believe our fashion is growing

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: My passion for music has always inspired my designs

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: Our look and image never change dramatically from one season to the next, so we need an edge

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never tried to do couture, because it's a whole different beast

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: You give loyalty, you'll get it back. You give love, you'll get it back

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: I bleed Dodger blue and when I die, I'm going to the big Dodger in the sky

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't love the Dodgers, there's a good chance you may not get into Heaven

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: The only Angels in Los Angeles are in Heaven, and they're looking down on the Dodgers

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: No, we don't cheat. And even if we did, I'd never tell you

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: About the only problem with success is that it does not teach you how to deal with failure

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody wants to win, but everybody doesn't win

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: You get an opportunity to do something for your country, you better get out and do it

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball is like driving, it's the one who gets home safely that counts

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really a cool, mellow guy. I'm not as crazy as everybody thinks

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no new news

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anybody should ever touch anybody in anger, ever

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Drumming's pretty physical. We sit at the back of the stage getting beat up like a workhorse

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm driven by music. It's in my blood, and I've never been able to stay away from it for too long

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're playing upside down, it takes twice the strength

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many drummers sit at the back covered in drums, and you never see them

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I take the best of all the styles I like and put them together in one package

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: By the age of 17, for me, we had got an recording contract, and, boom, I was gone

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: The Radiohead record, The Bends is my all-time favorite record on the planet

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The world's not a very comfortable place if you have a nightmare to face

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Partnerships are good engines for narrative

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness and politeness are not overrated at all. They're underused

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I look upon pride as a sin

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Human beings are glorious and preposterous characters

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I personally don't live a nihilistic life, I don't have any use for it

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Normal people with normal problems can be hilarious

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to make movies about my country from my point of view

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: In the political world, the only position I have is voter. I'm not a spokesman for anything

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to know about my politics, the only way to do that is to look at my work

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I inspire myself

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: My background is in psychology and I'm also a stage actor. That's my background

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Express yourself, don't hurt yourself

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: When people sometimes misquote me, I don't know if they understand what I'm saying

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: As a director, I have to feel realism from actors, and they can't be plastic

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a god, I'm just a simple guy

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not here to criticize anyone

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be always actor

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I like acting better than anything else, but, you know, directing's good

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm satisfied with the way 'The Room' turned out, and I don't want to change anything

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: If you surrendered to the air, you could ride it

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I get angry about things, then go on and work

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's a book you really want to read, but it hasn't been written yet, then you must write it

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I wrote my first novel because I wanted to read it

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Freeing yourself was one thing; claiming ownership of that freed self was another

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is or it ain't. Thin love ain't love at all

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: As you enter positions of trust and power, dream a little before you think

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: In this country American means white. Everybody else has to hyphenate

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: You need a whole community to raise a child. I have raised two children, alone

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: I would not want to see any relaxation of the law prohibiting human cloning

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot win an election without a fight

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: I do enjoy exercise, not because I am an exercise junkie but because it's terrific stress release

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no factions in the Liberal Party

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is I try to take people as I find them

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: My commitment to the forgotten families of Australia is to ease your cost of living pressure

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: I instinctively try to protect people from filth

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: Climate change is crap

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: Once people come to Australia, they join the team

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to treat people as people and not put them in pigeonholes

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: Be a doer and not a critic

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: Human progress has never been shaped by commentators, complainers or cynics

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders lead but in the end it's the people who deliver

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: I can only go one way. I've not got a reverse gear

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like everyone else in this country today. I am utterly devastated

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: You only require two things in life: your sanity and your wife

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't come into politics to change the Labour Party. I came into politics to change the country

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever the dangers of the action we take, the dangers of inaction are far, far greater

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: Of the 22 industrialized nations of the world, we're dead last in per capita giving to poor people

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: Relegating women to second-class citizenship was abolished when Jesus died on the cross

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have the same privileges and opportunities as men, given the New Testament

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: It is hard to say what the future holds, but this is probable - it won't be just like the past

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: A strong case can be made for religious leaders to speak out on political issues

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a minister, and I serve as a minister in addition to being a university professor

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the time has come for the United States to do even-handed justice

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: Nowhere in the Hebrew Scriptures does it say that God is omnipotent

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got some repenting to do

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: Christianity isn't the only group that has fundamentalists

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: The best leaders are following Christ. That's the best leader you can follow

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think God wants there to be a circus so we can show there's another way to respond

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not hitting on all cylinders, defensively. When we're playing good, I'll let you know

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have an impact anywhere you are

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: We need somebody to give us a chance

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: I've said all along that God is in control

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: The Lord doesn't always take you in a straight line. He tests you sometimes

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: Balance provides the chance for longevity. You can be a champion at work and at home

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have the strength or wisdom to get through a single day without guidance and grace from God

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: As big a deal as the Super Bowl is, it's not the most important thing going on in the planet

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a short attention span

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: New York is vertical - all skyscrapers

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we're lucky because there are very few people in life who get to do what we're doing

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: What always leads me in terms of my movies are characters

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is sick of big IT things that don't work

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't ever want IT to be the thing that holds GM back

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Out of the total of 11 movies, I got slammed

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of actors talk about doing their homework, but very few of them do it

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: All my movies, like Revenge, are under two hours

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I make a movie because it's something that inspires me

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the most wonderful people are the ones who don't fit into boxes

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Parenting is not for everybody. It changes your life. Especially when they're little

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: A key to keeping your husband is getting him to miss you. That keeps a marriage fresh

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if everything else is downplayed, I'll wear good shoes

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Many people lock a part of themselves away. It's a bit sacred

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: When you don't have people in your life pushing you, can you push yourself?

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have an issue with homosexuality, then it comes to your own fear and your own darkness

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a minister and so rock music was banned in our house

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I never go out during the day without sunglasses

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: When I think about fashion I think women will never lose that appetite for fashion

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I think women want to look beautiful. I think that's an important thing. It is relevant

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very passe to think women want to spend a fortune on clothes

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest challenge every day is to be a great mother and a great businesswoman

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned time management, organization and I have priorities

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can have it all. You just have to know it's going to work

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being behind the scene

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to help women and their families

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my greatest talents is recognizing talent in others and giving them the forum to shine

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: The way that I learned to be confident was I would ride the back of the city bus and sing very low

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I do something in life, I try to outdo myself

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here to be the guy that rubs people the wrong way sometimes

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: What, do you think I'm here to be second place, brother?

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: Me personally, I don't think I'm even hot enough to be getting dissed

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: To be selling out shows and these kids who don't speak English singing along every word? It's wild

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here to compete. I'm here to be number one

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here to be the greatest

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: Drake could diss me 20,000 times, and I would never diss him. I'm a fan

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very cultural person, and Canada is a very cultural place

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a connoisseur of products. I check out everything, I try everything

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I listen to my body. Some days all I want is a good steak and others, I crave veggies and quinoa

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep in mind that diversity does not just mean black. It means all of it - age, weight, gender

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: Lily Tomlin was one of the early comedy greats who influenced my courage to be the person I am

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do what I do to get nominated. I do what I do because I love it

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never felt like I was in my mother's shadow. If anything, I felt like I was in her embrace

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: Using my voice to recognize and celebrate other women is a joy for me

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't always feel fierce and fearless, but I do feel like I'm a rock star at being human

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to find a little joy and happiness, a lot of giggles - and maybe some pretty shoes

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to think 40 was old. Now I think, 'Hey, 40's hot!'

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ask for an apology because it's only tomorrow's fish-and-chip paper

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: I never grew up

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm out of here, I'm better than all of you

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been slagged off completely by the art world

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: It pleases me that people can be interactive

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: It wasn't so much destroying my dancing, it was destroying me

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I don't believe things myself, as well. Truth is such a transient thing

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: My mum has never wanted me to have children. She thinks I would be destroying my life, even now

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing that success has taught me is censorship

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: People try constantly to use me, and I hate it

Quote.Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the word 'pregnant' is funny

Quote.Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad news travels at the speed of light; good news travels like molasses

Quote.Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Tracy Morgan is subdued. I'm cool. I'm chilled out

Quote.Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote.QuoteValue: The paparazzi do what they do, man. They have a job, too

Quote.Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote.QuoteValue: All women like to look up to their men
